# `uteals`

[![Lifecycle:Experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/Lifecycle-Experimental-blue?style=flat)](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/)

An R package that provides common decorators, transformators, and
utility functions to enhance the [`teal`
package](https://cran.r-project.org/package=teal) ecosystem.

## Installation

``` r

# Install from GitHub
install.packages("pak")
pak::pkg_install("phuse-org/uteals@main")
```

## Development Status

This package is currently under development. Please see
[references](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/phuse-org.github.io/uteals/)
and [vignettes](https://phuse-org.github.io/uteals/articles/) for latest
available features.

## About

The `uteals` package is being developed by the **Teal Enhancements for
Industry Adoption** PHUSE working group. For more information about this
initiative, visit [`PHUSE`
website](https://advance.hub.phuse.global/wiki/spaces/WEL/pages/30441473/Teal+Enhancements+for+Cross-Industry+Adoption).

## Acknowledgments

The package hex sticker has been designed and produced by [Alan
Harrison](https://github.com/aharri34), who won the community design
contest. We are grateful for Alan’s winning design and the community’s
contribution to the visual identity of the `uteals` package.

## Contributing

We encourage the open source community to join this effort and
contribute to the development of `uteals`.

# Package index

- [`uteals`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/uteals-package.md)
  [`uteals-package`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/uteals-package.md)
  :

  Decorators and transformators for `teal` modules.

## Decorators

- [`forestplot_x_decorator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/forestplot_x_decorator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** :

  Change X-axis scaling decorator for
  [`teal.modules.clinical::tm_g_forest_rsp`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.modules.clinical/latest-tag/reference/tm_g_forest_rsp.html).

- [`ggplot_decorator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/ggplot_decorator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** :

  `ggplot` decorator

- [`patchwork_plot_decorator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/patchwork_plot_decorator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Patchwork Decorator

- [`title_footer_decorator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/title_footer_decorator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Title and Footer Decorator

## Transformators

- [`create_rel_risk_transformator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/create_rel_risk_transformator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Create Relative risk column
- [`merge_levels_transformator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/merge_levels_transformator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Combine levels of a variable into one level
- [`or_filtering_transformator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/or_filtering_transformator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Apply Logical AND/OR filter transformations

## Access Management

- [`extract_modules_to_yaml()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/extract_modules_to_yaml.md)
  **\[experimental\]** :

  Extract Non-Parent Module Labels to `YAML`

- [`keep_by_label()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/keep_by_label.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Filter Teal Modules by Label

- [`remove_by_label()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/remove_by_label.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Remove Teal Modules by Label

## Utility functions

- [`g_forest_with_transform()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/g_forest_with_transform.md)
  **\[experimental\]** :

  Create a forest plot from an `rtable` with x transform settings
